description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. DangerRally is a simple racing game.Drive doesn't spin and drift,so you can easily manipulate a car.The course is automatically generated by computer every time.(There are other premade courses.)The course is solid,so the car drops down when it went off the road.But the car can glide with wings.You can continue to race if your car land on the down road.And good use of glide make a shortcut.
description.short: DangerRally is a simple racing game.Drive doesn't spin and drift,so you can easily manipulate a car.The course is automatically generated by computer every time.(There are other premade courses.)The course is solid,so the car drops down when it went off the road.But the car can glide with wings.You can continue to race if your car land on the down road.And good use of glide make a shortcut.
